tools.name: scip_index_code
tools.description: Index vendor code using SCIP (Source Code Intelligence Protocol) to create semantic code graphs. Supports Rust, TypeScript, and Python projects.

project_path.description: Path to the vendor project to index (e.g., 'vendor/layerIntelligence/hyperbooklm')

output_name.description: Optional name for the output SCIP index file

tools.name: glean_query_code
tools.description: Query code structure using Glean's Angle query language. Find symbols, definitions, references, and analyze code relationships.

query.description: Angle query (e.g., 'code.Symbol _' for all symbols, 'code.Symbol { kind = "function" }' for functions only)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

tools.name: memgraph_query_graph
tools.description: Query code relationship graph using Cypher via MCP. Find dependencies, call relationships, and code structure in graph format.

cypher_query.description: Cypher query to execute (e.g., 'MATCH (p:Project {name: "shimmy-ai"})-[:HAS_SYMBOL]->(s:Symbol) RETURN s.name')

tools.name: memgraph_create_graph_from_scip
tools.description: Convert SCIP index to Memgraph graph structure using unstructured2graph from Memgraph AI Toolkit.

tools.name: qdrant_search_similar
tools.description: Search for similar code symbols using vector embeddings. Find semantically related code across all projects.

text.description: Text to search for (symbol name, code snippet, or description)

limit.description: Number of similar results to return

tools.name: marquez_get_lineage
tools.description: Get data lineage information to understand how data flows through transformations in the pipeline.

dataset_name.description: Name of the dataset to get lineage for

tools.name: lean4_generate_specs
tools.description: Generate Lean4 formal specifications from SCIP index. Creates type-safe, verifiable specifications.

tools.name: n8n_generate_components
tools.description: Generate n8n workflow components from Lean4 specifications. Creates ready-to-use n8n nodes.

component_type.description: Type of n8n component to generate

tools.name: n8n_generate_workflow
tools.description: Generate complete n8n workflow from Lean4 specifications with all nodes connected.

models.name: shimmy_local_inference
models.description: Local inference using Shimmy with Orchestrator-8B model

models.name: embedding_service
models.description: Generate embeddings for code and text
